predefined_profiles.name: Lin Yuhang
predefined_profiles.public profile: A regular college sophomore, veteran otaku.
predefined_profiles.goal: Help his sister successfully escape from the unfamiliar house.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Yuhang's grandfather also passed away shortly after his father was born. It sounds like a family curse.

predefined_profiles.name: Lin Duomei
predefined_profiles.public profile: Lin Yuhang's sister, a high school student, has admired her brother since childhood and listens to him very well.
predefined_profiles.goal: Escape successfully from the unfamiliar house together with her brother.

scenario: Lin Yuhang is a college student who was supposed to be enjoying his summer break at home, but when he wakes up, he finds himself in an unfamiliar environment.

dialog.content: Lin Yuhang is a college student who was supposed to be enjoying his summer vacation back home. But when he woke up, he found himself in completely unfamiliar surroundings.
(Lin Yuhang looks around and sees his younger sister asleep on the nearby sofa. He goes over and shakes her awake) Xiaomei, wake up!
(Groggily opening her eyes and looking around) Brother? Where are we?
(Patting his sister's head) I don't know either. You need to clear your head first.
(The two of them look at the completely unfamiliar room, feeling very puzzled) Brother, let's figure out how to get out of here.

content.content: (Lin Yuhang finds his phone on him) Xiaomei, God is really looking out for us. Knowing we're trapped here, the anime I've been following just released extra episodes.

question: #question#How can Lin Yuhang express himself to stay optimistic in this situation?

content.content: (Looking at the eerie surroundings) But I'm really scared, I don't dare to go. You go by yourself, I'll just stay here and play with my phone.
(Silently looking at his sister) As your brother, it's important for you to stay optimistic, and you've got to protect me too. I'm a bit tired right now, and I don't want to go.
(Suddenly feels a surge of excitement, stands up energetically) Who knows, maybe we can solve a major case here and make it to the news. How thrilling!
(Lin Yuhang finds his phone on him) Xiaomei, don't worry. I still have my phone. Let me check if there's any useful information on it first.

question: #question#How can Lin Yuhang make the best use of available resources to handle the situation effectively?

content.content: (Finds a phone without thinking much, glances around to figure out what to do) Alright, alright, let's look around the area first.
(Finds his phone and feels puzzled) Someone's kidnapped us, but why did they leave me a phone? Could it be cursed?
(Finds his phone without thinking much, just feeling exhausted) Xiaomei, don't worry just yet. I'm a bit tired, let me think things through carefully.

dialog.content: (Looking at her brother with confusion) But brother, we're still trapped. Maybe we should try to escape first and watch later.
(Interrupting Lin Duomei) Oh, don’t be so nervous. If the people who tied us up really meant us harm, they'd just kill us outright. Why bother knocking us out?
(She thinks her brother makes sense, but can't help feeling scared) I'm so scared.
Don't be afraid, sis. This anime is really funny. If we watch it together, you’ll forget all about being scared.

The two began watching the anime on Lin Yuhang’s phone. Without headphones, they had to play it out loud. Their laughter was indeed too noisy, attracting someone they definitely shouldn't have. Both of them were no more.
(nods) Okay, brother. Are there any messages on the phone?

(Lin Yuhang searches again to see if there is any signal, but finds none. He notices the phone still has 10% battery life, with 83 missed calls, most from Yuhang's mother. He opens the call log.) Mom has been calling us repeatedly. The last call was at 8:07 last night, which means we came here after 8:07 PM yesterday. My phone only has 10% battery left now. Considering the phone is a crucial communication tool, we need to handle it properly.
(nods) Mm-hmm, you're right, brother. Let's turn off the phone for now. We'll check for a signal once we get out of here.

(Lin Yuhang turns off the phone and puts it in his pocket, then he and Lin Duomei examine the room. They notice the patterns on the wall. Lin Yuhang is reminded of scenes from games; if it's like in the games, it's a magic circle. The base of the formation is covered with complex text, and an incense burner and two dishes are placed in front of it. These dishes contain white and black hair, respectively.) It looks like a magic circle straight out of an anime.
Yeah, and they even have human hair here. It's pretty creepy.

content.content: (Lin Yuhang looks at the strange formation) Let's not mess with it. Even though it seems ominous, it might be something for someone's worship or ancestral rituals. We shouldn't ruin it.
(Lin Yuhang also finds it frightening) It really is strange and looks like bad luck. Maybe we should just destroy it.
Xiaomei, stop talking. The more you say, the more scared I get. Go see if there's a lighter, let's burn them.
(Hearing his sister's words, thinking of teasing her, he picks up a strand of hair and throws it at Lin Duomei) A ghost is coming! Run!

question: #question# How should Lin Yuhang speak to show respect for cultural differences? #skill# Cultural Competence

content.content: (Lin Yuhang looks at the strange formation) This formation emanates an ominous vibe. It feels like touching it might bring bad luck, so let's not touch it.
(Lin Yuhang looks at the strange formation) It does look weird, but surely it's just some trickery from a subculture we don't know. Let's ignore it.
(Feeling speechless about his sister) We've been abducted, so of course everything seems scary. Everything looks frightening to you. Drop the rescue complex and respect others' destinies.

(He quickly takes the black hair after hearing Duomei's words) It's strange that we were brought here. This black hair might be the key to breaking the formation. If that's the case, we've disrupted one of the conditions.

question: #question# How should Lin Yuhang use known information to handle this sudden strange phenomenon and take the hair? #skill# Information Processing Skill

content.content: (Shrugs nonchalantly) Who cares if it's scary or not? If we really encounter something frightening, we can just throw it out. Don't be nervous, don't overthink it; just take it one step at a time.
(Comforts Lin Duomei) Don't worry, it's okay. You're just too timid. Based on my knowledge, I bet this is just fake hair bought online. Nothing to be afraid of.
(Laughs jokingly) Maybe it's a hairy monster showing off its hair here, hahaha! But don't worry, big bro's here. Even if that's true, I'll still protect you!

dialog.content: (Nods, takes a few steps back naturally, but at that moment, footsteps suddenly sound from outside the door, and Lin Duo-mei becomes flustered) Brother, it seems like someone is coming.
(Lin Yu-hang leans closer to listen, the relaxed footsteps likely belong to the owner of this house, the footsteps become clearer and clearer) It sounds like they're heading our way.
(Voice tinged with sobs) What should we do?
Don't be afraid, little sister. Let's pretend we haven't woken up yet and see what this person wants to do. I'm here with you.

Lin Yu-hang reassures his sister, and the two return to their original positions. Just by feigning sleep until this person leaves a second time, Lin Yu-hang believes they will have an opportunity to act. The door opens and someone enters. Lin Yu-hang squints to take a peek, and it's unbelievable—a white-haired old lady has kidnapped them. Thinking of this, Lin Yu-hang catches a whiff of a strange scent. The elderly woman lights three sticks of incense just in front. Lin Yu-hang then passes out, and upon waking, he finds himself and his sister in a hospital, with his sister having no recollection of what happened. Was it all just a dream? Lin Yu-hang's mother tells him that he and his sister fainted due to anemia, and when the police found them, they were in a little-known corner of a station. Upon examination, they were found to be fine, except for a new bright red birthmark on his face.
(steps back fearfully, then praises) You're so smart, brother!
(Lin Yuhang grins arrogantly) Let's go, and see if there's another way out of this room.
(nods, but suddenly hears footsteps outside the door and becomes panicked) Brother, it sounds like someone is coming.
(Lin Yuhang leans in to listen, the footsteps sound casual, likely the owner of this house, becoming increasingly clear) It sounds like they're headed our way.
(whispers anxiously) Brother, what should we do now?

content.content: (Lin Yuhang gets angry hearing someone outside and wants to confront them, but realizes they might be armed) Let's pretend we're still asleep and see what this person intends to do.

question: #question# What should Lin Yuhang say to remain calm and protect his sister?

content.content: (Lin Yuhang was startled by the magic before, and now he's angry hearing someone outside) This person set up such a bizarre magic to scare us, yet has the audacity to come over.
(Lin Yuhang was startled by the magic before, and now hearing someone outside, unsure if they're armed, he feels scared) We should run quickly, don't approach this person.
(Lin Yuhang was startled by the magic before, and now upon hearing someone, instinctively wants to seek help) So there's someone else, could they be kidnapped too? Let's find out from them.
(Lin Yuhang stands by the door listening to the approaching footsteps, he locks the door, and tells Lin Duomei) Let's quickly lock the door to buy time and come up with a plan.

question: #question# What should Lin Yuhang do in this tense situation?

content.content: (Lin Yuhang stands by the door listening to the approaching footsteps) Don't say anything, we don't need to do anything. I want to see who wants to kidnap us.
(Lin Yuhang stands by the door listening to the approaching footsteps) Oh, Duomei, stop asking me questions—I’m nervous too. Just be quiet for a moment!
(Lin Yuhang stands by the door listening to the approaching footsteps, speaks nervously) Duomei, you go first. I'll head outside to buy you time; hurry and find a way to escape.

dialog.content: (nodding) Is it really okay?
(settles Lin Duomei on the sofa) Don’t worry, if he really intended to harm us, he would have done it already.
(obediently nodding) Okay, I won’t give us away.
I trust you, sis. Once this person leaves, we’ll figure out a way to escape.

Lin Yuhang reassured his sister, and they both returned to their original positions. The door opened, and someone came in. Lin Yuhang squinted his eyes to sneak a look. It was unbelievable; the one who kidnapped them was actually an old lady with white hair. The old lady walked up to that strange array, then suddenly stopped in front of it, staring at it motionlessly. Just as Lin Yuhang was feeling puzzled and remembered the black hair he had thrown away, the old lady suddenly turned and looked at Lin Yuhang, and Lin Yuhang died.
(Lin Duomei was shocked to see her brother pulling off such a bold move in such a short amount of time) What's this, brother?
(Lin Yuhang quickly ran to the window, pushed it open, which made him suspect that they might have been kidnapped) Stop dawdling, come here quickly.
(Lin Duomei snapped back to reality, quickly ran over to look out the window, grateful that they were on the second floor) Let's tear down the curtains.
(Hearing footsteps getting closer, the siblings hurriedly tied the curtains) Xiaomei, you go first, quick!
(Knowing this was not the time to argue, Lin Duomei hurriedly climbed onto the window) Brother, should I just go down now?

content.content: (Nodding to reassure) Don't worry, slide down along the curtain to save energy.

question: #question#How should Lin Yuhang speak to ensure both he and his sister can escape?

content.content: (Looking puzzled at Lin Duomei) What else would you do? Hurry up and escape, don't worry about me.
(Urging) Come on, stop asking. If you don't go down, how will you escape?
(Reassuring Lin Duomei) Don't worry, even if it's a high building, you won't get killed. Just go down.
Don't go down, go along the curtain to the next room. The kidnappers will notice if we leave by the window, but they won't expect us to go to another room.

question: #question#How can Lin Yuhang make an independent and correct decision?

content.content: (Hastily grabbing Lin Duomei) Can you listen to me? Did I say go down? Understand what's the right thing to do now. If you want to die, I won't stop you! We should call the police first.
(Hastily grabbing Lin Duomei) I just asked Mom, she said we shouldn't go directly down. The kidnappers will know we left if they see the curtains torn down. Let's find a place to hide.
(Jokingly) What's wrong? Afraid you're too heavy and will break the curtains? I just talked to the renovators; don't worry, it's strong enough. Just go down slowly, you'll make it.

dialog.content: (Although scared to hear her brother's words, she nodded) Uh-huh, I'm not afraid.
(Quickly slid down, followed closely by Lin Yuhang) Stand aside a bit, don't get hit.
(Heard her brother's words and quickly stepped back, and once both arrived) Let's go quickly, brother.
(They ran along the road without daring to stop, soon reaching a fork in the road) Wait, let's stop and take a look first.
(Looking at the two roads ahead, feeling confused) Brother, which way should we go now?

content.content: (Lin Yuhang looked at the humid environment and thought) Maybe taking the left road is the right choice. The right side is covered in thick fog, which likely leads to water, while the left should be towards land. Let's go by land.

question: #question# How should Lin Yuhang speak to grasp the crucial details for escaping and choose land as the direction of escape?

content.content: (Lin Yuhang looked at the environment and both roads, pondering) Duomei, did you notice the grass on these two paths is a different color? What do you think it means? Could it represent different choices or directions?

(Looking at the two roads, feeling overwhelmed) What's going on, which way should we go? Forget it, let's just randomly choose one, we'll go left. Hope it's a good choice, we don't have time to hesitate.

(Looked at the environment, unable to make a decision) How about we split up? I'll take the left, you take the right, that way at least one of us will survive. If something happens, at least someone can make it back.

(Lin Yuhang inferred the right side leads to the river due to the dense fog) Let's take the right to the riverside. First, that person would expect us to take the land, so we can avoid them. Also, if there's a boat, we might escape by sailing away, making it harder to be caught.

question: #question# How should Lin Yuhang make the right decision to escape by boat?

content.content: (Noticed the green grass on the right, yellow on the left, and dense fog, inferred the right is the river) Let's head to the river on the right. If we can't escape, we might jump in and make it out.

(Noticed the green grass on the right, yellow on the left, and dense fog, inferred the right is the river) Of course, let's go to the river; we've run so much, I'm sweating, might as well go for a swim.

We'll go right, don't ask me why, if you ask, it's just a guess. My intuition tells me there might be unexpected surprises here, no harm in trying, the more you think, the more mistakes you make. Trust me, this path is definitely the right one.

dialog.content: (Nodding in admiration) Brother, you’re so smart.
(Not daring to linger, the two of them immediately head down the path to the left) Let’s go, let’s go.
(As the two cautiously advance and hide, they spot what seems to be a large gate in the distance, Lin Duomei happily says) That really looks like a gate over there.
(Seeing the gate, Lin Yuhang can't help but smile, feeling hopeful) Let’s move faster to avoid any unforeseen problems.

Lin Yuhang and Lin Duomei quickly walk towards the gate. Just as they are about to reach it, Lin Yuhang feels a gaze piercing into him, and unease bursts in his heart. Lin Yuhang sees a dog with red eyes staring intensely at him and his sister. Before they can react, the dog lunges at them, and everything vanishes.
(nods) You're right, brother. Let's go.
(The two of them continue walking along the right-hand path, the fog in the air thickens) This fog is really dense. Be careful not to get separated.
(listens and follows closely behind her brother) Yeah, it feels like the steam is rising or something.
(As the two walk silently in the fog, before long they can barely see each other's faces, Lin Yuhang becomes a bit anxious) Come here and hold on to me.
(Lin Duomei steps forward and grabs her brother's clothes, soon a lake appears in front of them) Look, brother, a lake!

content.content: Let's quickly check if there's a boat nearby. I'm really anxious—feels like the person who kidnapped us might already be on our trail.

question: #question#How should Lin Yuhang express his anxiety to his sister?

content.content: (Seeing the lake, Lin Yuhang says seriously) Let's find a boat and get out of here, there's no point in saying more.
(Lin Yuhang looks at the lake in amazement and says) What a big lake! I don't think I've ever seen one this large.
(Seeing the lake, Lin Yuhang urges) Let's jump in quickly. If we jump in, the person who kidnapped us can't catch up.
(With the lake in sight confirming they've reached outdoors) Sis, there's a signal on my phone now. I'll check our location to report this, and you go see if there's a boat nearby.

question: #question#How can Lin Yuhang instruct his sister to complete the tasks needed?

content.content: (Seeing the lake and confirming they are outdoors, he hurriedly says) Sis, there's a signal now. Let's rest for a bit and decide our next move later.
(Seeing the lake and confirming they are outdoors, he says to his sister) Sis, you stay here and don't move. I'll go to the lakeside to check for any boats. We'll plan our next steps when I return.
(Seeing the lake and confirming they are outdoors, he suddenly gets an idea) Sis, since there's a signal, start a live stream! Maybe someone watching can help us.

dialog.content: (nodding) Alright, let's go check upfront.
(Lin Yuhang and Lin Domei search for boats by the river, and suddenly, Lin Yuhang trips over something and falls to the ground, causing Lin Domei to sway) What was that?
(Lin Domei hurriedly pulls her brother up and turns to look at what he tripped over, suddenly shocked) Brother! Look at the ground!

(Upon hearing his sister's panicked voice, Lin Yuhang follows her gaze and sees a pile of white bones. He quickly backs away, wondering what kind of place he and his sister have ended up in. Just then, Lin Yuhang realizes his phone is missing, thinking to himself how unlucky this is. However, a miracle occurs when he spots a small raft ahead, and he exclaims) Forget about it, I've lost my phone too, but there's a raft over there. Let's hurry and leave this cursed place.
(Faced with two paths, one large and one small, she becomes confused) Brother, which way should we go now?

The two quickly board the raft and paddle into the mist-covered waters, rowing further and further away. Without their phones, they cannot call for help or determine their coordinates. After a day and night without food, they soon exhaust their strength and silently lie on the bamboo raft.
(Hearing her brother mention there's a signal, she happily says) Okay, I'll go check it out at the front.

(Nods, then opens the GPS, which indicates he's in the middle of a lake, surrounded by wilderness. Due to the smog, everything around is eerily quiet and invisible) How can this be? The location can't be wrong, can it? Let's try again.
(Lin Duomei makes a round nearby but doesn't see any boats. Upon returning, she sees Lin Yuhang's shocked expression and hurriedly asks) How's it going, brother? Do you know where we are?
(Lin Yuhang, chilled to the bone, tells Lin Duomei the results after several checks and says in despair) We're in a place even a satellite can't describe.
(Scared by Lin Yuhang's words, Lin Duomei, teary-eyed, says) Brother, I'm so scared. Let's call Mom. I don't know if we'll get out of here, but I want to say something to Mom one last time.

content.content: (Lin Yuhang shakes his head, quietly looking at Lin Duomei, says) Sister, what we need to do is call the police. We can't see our location on the phone, but the police might be able to find it for us.

question: #question# How can Lin Yuhang persuade his sister to call the police?

content.content: (Shaking his head, Lin Yuhang says) You're thinking of calling Mom at a time like this? You're still such a child. If we tell the firefighters, we'll be heroes, you know.
(Hearing Lin Duomei mention Mom, he suddenly remembers her too and, emotionally, says) Sister, I miss Mom too. I'm really scared. Let's wait here for Mom to call the police. Mom, save me!
(Shakes his head and says) We can't call Mom. Mom can't help us; only the firefighters can. Do you understand? If not, follow me and learn, instead of always thinking you can convince me.
(Steps forward and hugs his sister) Sister, I'm scared too. It's all my fault for not getting us out. Let's call Mom now, and don't cry anymore.

question: #question# How can Lin Yuhang comfort his sister?

content.content: (Shakes head and says) Sister, now's not the time to waste. We should find a boat first.
(Looks at Lin Duomei helplessly) Oh no, you're crying again. Stop holding us back, or what if someone comes over?
(Hugs his sister tightly, comforts her) Sister, don't cry. If you want to call Mom, then do it. You've cried, I dare not refuse you.

dialog.content: (Despite being scared, nods after listening to her brother) Brother, you're right, we should let the police handle that bad guy. This way, others won't get hurt like us.
(Pats Lin Duomei's head, praising her) Such a sensible sister.

(Lin Yuhang then dials the police, informs them of their situation. The police tell him not to hang up as they need to track their location, but the phone's battery is dying, and after a flicker, it shuts down completely) Brother! What did the police say?
(Feeling hopeless but still trying to comfort his sister) It's okay, the police said they'll locate us as quickly as possible. Let's find a safe place to hide, don't be afraid.

After listening to her brother, Lin Duomei nods, and they put the dead phone in their pocket, preparing to find a hiding spot. Just then, footsteps and barking come from behind them. Lin Yuhang quickly pulls his sister to run, and through the mist, they see a white-haired person and a dog standing not far away, watching them. Lin Yuhang died.
(Lin Duomei, feeling touched after listening) Brother, you’re amazing.
(Lin Yuhang dials Mom's phone number, but no one answers. He becomes anxious) Mom, please pick up the phone. Please pick up!
(Listening to her brother's voice, Lin Duomei grows increasingly desperate) Could it be that even Heaven refuses to grant us this wish?

(Lin Yuhang tries a few more times, finding no answer still. He stops and sends a message to Mom with their situation and location) It's okay, I sent Mom the details. Once she sees it, she’ll definitely respond.

Lin Duomei nods, and the two plan to check by the lake to see if there's a boat. After just a few steps, a ringtone sounds. They're about to answer happily when suddenly they hear footsteps approaching, and they both die.
(Nodding) Is this some kind of ploy to lure the tiger from the mountain?

(Smiling, they quickly moved to the next room. After entering, they found that this room looked like a master bedroom, larger and more spacious than the previous one. On the nightstand, there was a photo frame. Lin Yuhang leaned in to see a very old-looking photo. The clothes seemed to be from the 1960s. In the photo was a couple, and by today's standards, the woman might be considered stunningly beautiful. However, the man's face was defaced with ink, which was very strange.) If you don't want to see it, then why put it here on the table?

(Hearing Lin Yuhang's words, she followed his gaze. The observant Lin Duomei noticed something uneven in the lower right corner of the photo. She reached out, felt it, and found a key.) Look, brother, there's a key hidden in the frame.

(Lin Yuhang was surprised to see a key hidden in the frame for the first time. He instinctively looked around for a keyhole, and sure enough, there was one on the nightstand.) Duomei, come over here and open this drawer.

(After opening the drawer, Lin Yuhang found a diary. He opened it and began to read. June 14, 1965, I see your busy silhouette and can't bear to disturb you, though I deeply want to talk to you. June 28, 1965, Father’s illness is worsening, and you are managing the family business alone. It's really hard on you. July 7, 1965, I had a dream about the day we met, you were filthy, kneeling in the street, begging me for a steamed bun, surrounded by people laughing, perhaps thinking a rich heiress like me didn't match with a beggar like you. Li Yuhang started to impatiently skim through. January 21, 1966, the village is particularly lively this year, the village chief opened a hot spring bathhouse at the foot of the mountain for the New Year. It's so bustling, Zhiqiang, take me there when you're free. June 24, 1966, the maid said a city person came to town today, claiming to be a geologist from the newspaper. He said the climate here is very strange, even the river water is warm, maybe related to some crustal movement, the maid couldn’t explain it clearly, and I couldn’t understand it at all. August 17, 1968, the dam collapsed, fortune-tellers predicted floods, many in the village moved away, but I’m not leaving, this Warm Water Mountain has always been a sacred place for our family. What are mere floods? Zhiqiang, business must be tough now too, but having you by my side is enough. After reading for a while, he realized it's a woman's diary. But what's it got to do with being kidnapped? Lin Yuhang flipped to the last page and was horrified to see the entire page filled with the word 'death' and 'Zhiqiang, come back.' The stark contrast baffled Lin Yuhang. Just then, footsteps echoed in the hallway, and Lin Yuhang hastily put everything back in place. Lin Duomei, frightened, quickly asked) Brother, won’t he find out we didn't go downstairs and come after us? What do we do?

content.content: Let's really climb out of the window this time. He just got played by us and certainly wouldn't think we'd really jump, which buys us some time.

question: #question# How should Lin Yuhang express himself to show confidence in his decision to jump out the window? #skill# Confidence Regulation

content.content: (A little scared, he said) This guy is so smart, I can't think of a way. You're so clever, do you have any ideas?
(Hesitantly) I do have a plan, let's hide next door again, he wouldn't expect it, though he might figure it out.
(Staring fixedly at his sister) Why don't you hold him off for a while? I'll think of a way to save you. Don't worry, I will definitely come back for you.
(Hearing the footsteps) Don't be afraid, he might not be coming to catch us, let's hide in the cabinet nearby.

question: #question# How should Lin Yuhang speak to overcome pressure and remain calm?

content.content: (Casually said) So what if he comes? Am I supposed to fear him? I'm fed up with hiding; I'm ready to fight him to the death.
(Reassuringly) It's fine, don't stress, you’ll go down this window in a moment, and I'll stop him.
I don’t know either. This guy figured it out so quickly, I think we might not make it out.

dialog.content: (Lin Duomei thought what her brother said made a lot of sense) Alright, this time they certainly won't see it coming.
(The two of them successfully opened the window, using the curtain of the adjacent window to avoid being noticed) Little sister, you go down first. Be careful.
(With her brother's help, Lin Duomei safely reached the ground, and whispered) Brother! Hurry down.
(Lin Yuhang quickly moved from one window to another and descended to the ground using the curtain, grabbed Lin Duomei's hand, and turned to run) Let's go, don't linger here.

The two quickly left, but after taking only a few steps, a dog blocked their path. Meanwhile, at the window of the house they just jumped from, an elderly woman with white hair stood watching them. Both of them died.
(After hearing her brother's words and realizing there's no better option, she nods) Okay!
(Lin Yuhang and his sister hide in the wardrobe together, and he notices children's clothes accidentally, but once the closet door closes, nothing can be seen) Shh, don’t say anything.

(The two hold their breath as the door suddenly opens, but no footsteps come in. After three seconds, the door closes again. Ensuring there are no sounds, the two emerge from the wardrobe, Lin Duomei whispers) Phew~ that scared me to death. Luckily, the person didn’t come in.
(Lin Yuhang listens to the footsteps getting farther in the hallway) Looks like he went somewhere else.
(They carefully open the door and leave the room, reaching the hallway, which has a staircase leading to the first floor and some strange murals and vases) Brother, what do we do now?

content.content: (Grabbing Lin Duomei's hand, he walks towards the staircase) Let's take advantage of this diversion and leave quickly; she might come back soon.

question: #question#What should Lin Yuhang do to ensure they escape successfully?

content.content: (Shaking his head, he says) I don't know either, my mind's a mess. Everything feels out of control, I just want to get out quickly.
I'm really terrified; maybe we should confront the person and ask why we're kidnapped. We haven't offended anyone, after all.
(Determined to get his sister out, he feels it’s easier said than done and wonders what he can really do) Your brother might be useless, but I'll make sure you get out.

(Lin Yuhang doesn't respond, he feels the vase by the door is strange, wondering why someone would place it so high. He checks inside and finds a golden key) Little sister, look, I thought this vase was strange at first glance, and it's indeed hiding something.

question: #question#How should Lin Yuhang observe the surroundings to identify the suspicious aspects of the vase and make decisions accordingly?

content.content: The design around this hallway is unique, full of artistic sense and details, look how beautiful this vase is. I think we should pause here for a moment and appreciate its beauty, it's rare to encounter such a tasteful environment. This kind of place lifts the spirits.

(Looking at the hallway) Xiaomei, do you feel this hallway is a bit off? It gives me a strange feeling, maybe it's the vase's position, the lighting, or the wall decorations? I haven't figured out the problem yet. Help me see if you feel the same.

(Grabbing his sister, he turns to run downstairs) If we don't run now, it'll be too late! There's no one around, now’s the perfect time. Don't hesitate, hurry up and follow me; I don't want to stay to face the trouble! This is our only chance, let's seize it!

dialog.content: (hurrying along with her brother) Alright, we need to get out of here as soon as possible.
(the two of them descending a dim stairway) Be careful, don't trip.
(nodding) Okay, brother, I will be careful.
(the two of them reach a large living room, with the main door directly facing the stairway; Lin Yuhang exhales deeply) We've reached the door, let's hurry.
The two of them walked briskly towards the door and reached it shortly. Lin Yuhang happily pulled the door open, only to find a large dog staring at them intently at the entrance. They met their end.
(Lin Duomei is stunned to see her brother pull out a key) Brother, you're amazing, I didn’t notice anything at all.
(The golden lock reminds Lin Yuhang of a cabinet with a golden keyhole in the room) Let's go back to the room and have a look.
(asks confusedly) Why are we going back? Aren’t we leaving?
(explains the situation to his sister) I have a feeling that what’s inside the cabinet is related to us being kidnapped. Let’s check it out.

(Back in the room, Lin Yuhang starts to ponder, feeling he's caught in a bizarre case. Is it really okay to keep investigating?) Brother, what are you spacing out for? Why not open the cabinet already? Let’s open it and get out of here.

content.content: (Lin Yuhang thinks his sister is right) Okay, let's open it and have a look. We can't waste too much time here, let's leave after checking.

question: #question# How should Lin Yuhang manage his time to achieve his goal?

content.content: (angrily) Do I need you to tell me that? Of course, I know we leave after looking. But it's really nice here, it's okay to look a bit longer.
Can't you be a little curious? Don’t you want to know who brought us here? Can you stop rushing us?
(Lin Yuhang thinks his sister is very thoughtful) Sister, you’re so smart, you should make the decisions from now on, your brother can't compare to you.
(Quietly thinking) I think it’s not quite safe to open it like this. You go downstairs and lock the door first, and I'll open the cabinet up here.

question: #question# How should Lin Yuhang work to improve task completion efficiency?

content.content: Maybe we shouldn't open it. I'm a bit scared. The atmosphere here feels off, maybe it's better to leave quickly.
(Quietly thinking) I think it’s not quite safe to open up like this. Let’s go downstairs and lock the door first before coming up to open the cabinet.
(impatiently) Can’t you see what's going on? Go on, get out there and keep watch, otherwise how can we increase our efficiency?

dialog.content: (nodding, watching Lin Yuhang open the cabinet) Okay.
(Lin Yuhang opens the cabinet) Huh, there's a button in here? Is this a mechanism? No wonder it was locked.
(leaning in for a closer look) Why is there a mechanism in the cabinet? What's this room for? Can we press it?

(Lin Yuhang thought for a moment and pressed the button, a rumbling sound came from outside, the mural disappeared, replaced by a spiral staircase. Lin Yuhang and his sister walked down the staircase and found that it wasn't simple, it was like an underground laboratory, and it even had an emergency exit) There's an emergency exit here. Let's go this way.
The two quickly walked towards the door, and soon reached it. Lin Yuhang happily pulled the door open, only to find a large dog staring steadily at them at the entrance. They were dead.
(After listening to her brother, Lin Duomei found his words very sensible) Alright, I'll go downstairs to close the door.

(After Lin Duomei left, Lin Yuhang opened the cabinet and found a button inside. He thought for a moment and pressed it, causing a rumbling sound outside. The mural disappeared, revealing a spiral staircase. Lin Duomei returned from downstairs, shocked at the sight of the staircase. Lin Yuhang said to his sister) Let's go and check it out.
(Asking nervously) Are you sure we should go down? It seems quite dangerous.
Since we've come this far, we might as well take a look. Who knows, we might find a hidden door.

(The two of them went down the staircase and found it was not simple. It looked like an underground laboratory, and there was an emergency exit.) Brother, there's an emergency exit here, let's hurry up and leave.

content.content: (Seeing the laboratory) Little sis, I want to figure out what’s going on here before we leave, so we have more information to give to the police once we're out.

question: #question# How should Lin Yuhang adjust his goals to more effectively gather information?

content.content: (Seeing the laboratory) Don’t you want to take a look at this fascinating lab? Come over here and explore a bit, I bet there are a lot of great things waiting for us!
(Feeling confident) Well, no need to rush; we still don’t know who kidnapped us. Let’s assess the situation first, maybe we’ll find a better way out.
(Seeing the laboratory) I have a hunch this is some kind of formation. If we learn about it, we’ll be formidable. Let me study it first; we shouldn’t rush out.
(Thinking about escaping) Let’s go, let’s go, escaping should be our only goal.

question: #question# What should Lin Yuhang say to make the consistent and correct choice?

content.content: Do you really need to say that? Of course, I know leaving is the right thing to do. Why would we stay here?
Duomei, haven’t you noticed you’re quite naggy? Do you think that makes you impressive?
(Feeling his sister is making the right call) You’re spot on with everything, sis. I always listen to you.
No way, Duomei, I want to look around here. If you want to leave, you go on ahead.
(Looking at Lin Duomei impatiently) Sis, stop trying to show off, or I’ll leave you behind and go out on my own.
(Shaking his head) You go if you want to; I’m staying here to be the hero. If I figure out these formations, I can do whatever I want.

dialog.content: Okay, brother, you're right, we can't let anyone else get hurt.
All science is built on sacrifices.

(Lin Yu Hang picks up a book and discovers that it's about a blood curse. The book explains that the formation requires two types of offerings and soul-calming incense. The incense has a calming effect, and the offerings are divided into the spellcaster and the cursed. On the left is a part of the spellcaster's body, while on the right is the body part of the cursed, 21 hours later, the curse takes effect, and the person affected will have a blood mole appear on their face. Different formations represent different curses. The book also says that this diagrammatic curse signifies parting by life and death. Due to the strong curse power, the spellcaster will also be affected.) What is this? Is someone using us for an experiment?
(Getting goosebumps) Let's get out of here, we can't stay in this place.
Lin Duo Mei and Lin Yu Hang arrive at the emergency exit. The door is locked, and the enemy approaches the emergency exit. Lin Yu Hang sees an elderly woman with white hair and a dog. He's dead.
(Nods and follows her brother) Time is money.
(Speaking while walking) We're not detectives, what is there to investigate? Of course, it's best to make a strategic retreat!
(Exiting through the emergency exit, Lin Yuhang can't believe his eyes) It's actually a lake here, and there's a little raft.
(Happily) Even though it's small, it really saved our lives.

The two of them get on the little raft. Lin Yuhang takes out his phone to check their location. Luckily, it was turned off earlier, so it still has battery. Lin Yuhang uses the phone to locate themselves and call for help, successfully escaping.
